app.name: Mininet Editor
app.one_liner: SDN topology editor in your web browser with Mininet, image and addressing plan export.

screens.name: Topology Canvas
screens.purpose: Primary workspace for building and editing SDN topologies with drag-and-drop nodes, connection lines, and dynamic labels.

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persist the current project state to local storage or file export (JSON or Python script).

mvp_plan: week 1: Add basic export to JSON
week 1: Enable persistent storage using browser APIs
week 1: Implement core topology canvas with node placement and linking
acceptance_tests: After closing and reopening the browser, the previously created topology is restored.
User can create a topology with at least one host and one switch, connect them, and export as JSON that includes all elements.
